message.entry: InputSamplePeriod must be greater than zero.
The standard deviation parameter must be less than 1/(10*sqrt(2*log(2))*fd*Ts), where fd is the maximum Doppler shift and Ts is the input sample period.
The standard deviation of the second Gaussian function must be less than 1/(10*sqrt(2*log(2))*fd*Ts), where fd is the maximum Doppler shift and Ts is the input sample period.
The standard deviation of the first Gaussian function must be less than 1/(10*sqrt(2*log(2))*fd*Ts), where fd is the maximum Doppler shift and Ts is the input sample period.
The standard deviation parameters must be less than 1/(10*sqrt(2*log(2))*fd*Ts), where fd is the maximum Doppler shift and Ts is the input sample period.\n
PathDelays must be a real-valued row vector or scalar.
Number of paths of channel filter object not equal to the number of channels of Rayleigh fading object.
DopplerSpectrum must be a single doppler object or a vector of doppler objects of the same length as PathDelays.
Unsupported Doppler spectrum type.
AvgPathGaindB must be real-valued and the same size as PathDelays.
Elements of AvgPathGaindB cannot be Inf or NaN.
KFactor cannot be set for a Rayleigh Channel.
KFactor must be real.
KFactor cannot be Inf or NaN.
KFactor cannot be negative.
KFactor must be a scalar or a row vector of the same size as PathDelays.
DirectPathDopplerShift cannot be set for a Rayleigh Channel.
DirectPathDopplerShift must be real.
DirectPathDopplerShift cannot be Inf or NaN.
DirectPathDopplerShift must be of the same size as KFactor.
When the maximum Doppler shift is zero, setting DirectPathDopplerShift to a non-zero value has no effect on the channel. DirectPathDopplerShift should also be set to zero.
DirectPathInitPhase cannot be set for a Rayleigh Channel.
DirectPathInitPhase must be real.
DirectPathInitPhase cannot be Inf or NaN.
DirectPathInitPhase must be of the same size as KFactor.
When the maximum Doppler shift is zero, setting DirectPathInitPhase to a non-zero value has no effect on the channel. DirectPathInitPhase should also be set to zero.
StoreHistory must be false if MaxDopplerShift is zero.
HistoryLength must be positive integer or ''auto''.
OptimizationMode must be either ''Accuracy'' or ''Speed''.
When the maximum Doppler shift FD is zero, using a non-zero value for the Doppler shift of the line-of-sight component, FDLOS, has no effect on the channel. FDLOS should also be zero.
DopplerSpectrum must be a Doppler object.
